==Japanese==
{{wikipedia|lang=ja}}
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=irr|sort=すいか}}

===Etymology===
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=すいか}} compound {{m|zh|西瓜|tr=sej kwæ|lit=west + melon}}. Compare modern {{etyl|cmn|-}} {{zh-l|西瓜|tr=xīguā|watermelon}}. ''sui'' is the [[唐音]] of ''西''. There is an alternative spelling of [[水瓜]], which may be seen as both [[ateji]] and a calque of {{etyl|en|ja|sort=すいか}} {{m|en|watermelon}}. [[Category:Japanese calques|すいか]]
